Generation II.Gold: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
Generation II.Silver: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.
Generation II.Crystal: The round balls found on the fallen antlers can be ground into a powder that aids in sleeping.
Generation II.Stadium 2: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted. Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its strangely shaped antlers have the power to bewitch those who see them. Medicine made by grinding up the black orbs from fallen antlers is an effective treatment for insomnia.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon apparently used to live in much harsher environments , and thus it once had stronger psychic powers than it does now.
Generation IX.Violet: It's said that this Pokémon used to be stronger long ago when it had many enemies, and that it was even able to evolve under its own power.
